name: Arbitrary
description:
ATTENTION CITIZEN!!!!

AS THE CITY PREPARES FOR OUR USUAL WEEKLY BUST-OUT OF TRAITORS, TERRORISTS OR ANY WISEGUY BEING IN THE WRONG PLACE AT THE WRONG TIME, 
WE REMIND YOU TO PICK WISELY WHAT YOU BRING WITH YOURSELF WHEN YOU WALK OUT OF YOUR HOME. IF WE FIND YOU WITHOUT IMPORTANT DATA, THERE IS NO TURNING BACK.
YOU GOT ONE CHANCE TO TAKE YOUR BELONGINGS AND MOVE TO YOUR OBJECTIVE.
ANY INDIVIDUAL DISPLAYING SINGS OF HOSTILITY TOWARDS OUR GLORIOUS ARMY WILL BE SHOT ON SIGHT.
SEVERAL FELLOW CITIZENS HAVE STATED BUMPS AND HOLES ON THE ROAD. WE TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY WHATSOEVER FOR ANY DAMAGE TAKEN BY THOSE THINGS.

IS THIS SYSTEMATIC TOTALITARIANISM? OVERLY-COMPLEX STATE TERROR?

NOPE, JUST COMPLETELY ARBITRARY. GOOD LUCK.

THESE ARE YOUR INSTRUCTIONS CITIZEN:

  • W, A, S, D to move through our glorious city.
  • SPACE to retry.
  • ESCAPE (hold) to quit our magnificent world.

P.S: IF OUR PERFECT WORLD ARBITRARILY DECIDES TO SPIN YOU AROUND, RESET IT TO SEE IF THE SUPREME COMMANDER ALLOWS YOU TO MOVE AROUND.

P.S.S: THESE GUYS MIGHT KNOW HOW TO GET AROUND!

Made by: Christian (@CHChistris), Ricardo (@mestiar) and Alexander (@alesandeI)

Music by: Carlos (@CarlosIsCarLost)
